Reviews.Title: Doesn't get any better
Reviews.Author: Ralf Conquest "RJC"
Reviews.Content: I bought a generic tablet back before tablets were really popular.  It was android 1.5 and no upgrades were really feasible.  I used it and loved it.  But finally decided to replace it.  So I did lots of research and found that tablets are all over the charts these days from reasonably priced to extreme.  I read the specs on this tablet and it was a story of sounding a little too good to be true.  But I took a gamble based on the low price and I bought.  I will say I couldn't be happier.  Everything works.  Browsing the web is just like a pc speedwise.  The Googleplay store works like a champ.  I love the voice active search.  I can speak what I want it to look for and it finds it.  I have used this many more times that I ever thought I would.  And this wasn't even listed on the features for the product listing so I consider it a bonus.  My wife and I raced to see who could lookup a listing of songs by an old band we remembered.  She on her laptop and I on my tablet.  I spoke and she typed.  I won of course.  You will be happy you bought this tablet.  Its better than some of those twice this price easy.

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet .
Reviews.Author: Techpreneur
Reviews.Content: Really amazed that this level of technology is available for this price. The simple and elegant design rivals that of ipad, yet it come pre-loaded with google play so you can download all the apps you want. I use for business mostly, PDF, CRMs, etc... Works great with any Wi Fi(i.e starbucks, barnes and noble, mcdonalds). Full HTML5 web browsing (i was surprised by that). Screen is responsive and easy to clean battery holds chrage for a long time as long as you dim the brightness. No complaints here. Just lots of impressed clients.

Reviews.Title: A really good tablet
Reviews.Author: pennywyze
Reviews.Content: After being pleased with a Coby Kyros Mid 7122 and later being disappointed after buying a Coby Kyros MID 7042, I decided to give a shot to another budget tablet company that I haven't heard of. In fact, I'm not even sure what the name of the Tablet is other than an A13 tablet.I have to say...I'm more than pleased with my purchase. Now, onto my review-Appearance/Design-The first thing I noticed about this tablet is the fact that it's really thin. Not paper thin or anything, but comparable to Razr products being that it's about a centimeter in thickness.The colors are quite typical of budget tablets; it has a dark gray finish with black trim around the screen.One thing I wasn't too crazy about because I'm so used to my budget tablets being Coby Kyros design, would be that the inputs are in awkward spots. For example, the AC power jack input it located at the very top of the tablet as is the USB input. It just seems weird.The power button is on top (when I'm used to it being on the side as well) and the volume button is on the side of the tablet. (right side)Score- 8/10Interface/stability-This runs on android 4.0, but it can be upgraded and I believe mine is running on 4.1 or something along the lines.The one thing I wasn't crazy about was how big the icons are. I mean, they're huge and seem more suitable for a 10-inch tablet, however, this isn't the case. I've also noted that there aren't any options to change the size of the icons whatsoever. (Perhaps there's an app to help out, but why waste space?)Anyway, unlike the craptacular Coby Kyros mid 7042, this tablet DOES NOT HAVE ANY ISSUES WITH CRASHING.The customizable options are a little limited however and certain options found in earlier versions of android tablets are nowhere to be found in this one.Apps work really well on this tablet. Apps such as Netflix, Youtube (which is not pre-installed), Angry Birds, Temple Run, Fruit Ninja HD (which is pre-installed), Fish game and others run just fine with the only flaw I can possibly think of being that if you play a game while using a live wallpaper and the screen goes to "sleep", once you tap the program again, the screen will be a weird color (equivalent to that of a negative photo), until you do a quick exit and tap the game again to play it. This was minor at best and it wasn't a tablet-breaking experience. This minor quirk also didn't "freeze" the tablet or cause it to restart.It's just an excellent firmware with 4.0 plus interface that works as described.Score- 9.5/10Speed-This tablet is really fast. The speed is comparable to the Coby Kyros 4.0 or perhaps even some high end tablets.The only downer is that at times after web pages load, you'll often have to touch the screen an extra time or two because for "some" web pages, it has a slight delay. It's really not much to speak of but still worth noting. Games run like a charm. I played Fruit Ninja and it's really fast, the graphics have no lag, there's no input lag or anything.Netflix was slightly different because it needed a little extra time to start, but once it started, I was able to watch movies and shows, exit and re-initialize the program and actually the second time I re-opened Netflix, it loaded slightly faster for some reason. The start up time is somewhere around 20 seconds or less in some cases.Score- 9.8/10Features/toucscreen/Sound-This tablet features Google Play and it's very easy to setup. Basically, if you have a google account (gmail), you'll enter your gmail with password and it syncs. Nothing more needs to be done. In addition to syncing with google, you can also add your regular emails to keep in sync with everything.Personally, I'm not that crazy about Google play and I sort of prefer 1mobilemarket, but in Googleplay, you have all the apps you could possibly ask for with the exception of the few that are signature apps such as Amazon Kindle (my favorite)...This tablet also has a sound recorder, camera/camcorder (yes, you can do skype and such, but the camera is just ok. Make sure you have enough light or at least tweak the camera settings for Skype), it comes with what's called a 2160p pvideo player which actually has really good quality for streaming videos off an SD card or downloaded videos. I haven't tried the music player but there's one pre-installed, it has voice search capability, I'm assuming a GPS/satellite addy that comes with Google play. I have the slightest idea how it works, and it also comes pre-installed with some games.Anything else that you want will have to be downloaded by Googleplay, amazon app or 1mobile etc.Now, onto the touchscreen which I love. It's fast, it's responsive, however, you can't calibrate it. It's no big deal because it's sensitive enough. The only delay you'll have with the touchscreen would be when web pages are loading.One of the odd things about this tablet is actually the screen, because I'm not sure what it's made off, but it isn't slick like the other tablets I own. It feels dry, and it doesn't smudge for me.The sound is good, but it doesn't have an equalizer or any tweaks to boost the volume. You may want to download an app called 'Speakerboost' if you want loud volume. Of course, it sounds great with earphones/headphones or any external speakers.And finally, my cons list-Cons-The first thing I noticed about this tablet was how bright it was. It's extremely bright to the point of calling it slight oversaturation. Similar to if you turn your TV's brightness all the way up. This has no effect on videos but it does bother the battery life.The battery life itself was really bad until I turned the brightness all the way down. (don't worry, it's still going to be bright) and downloaded an app called "Night Mode" which helped the battery life. Initially, however, the first few minutes of fiddling around with the tablet, the battery was dying by the minute. I can't estimate how long the battery life is but I've tested it without charging it for the past 2 and a half hours and it's still kicking at around 50 percent and lower. (Keep in mind that initially, I DID NOT download an app to tune the screen brightness)Now that I have that app installed, the battery is quite normal. I'll have to update with an edit to tell everyone the exact battery life.In my opinion however, the Coby Kyros brand has a much better battery life than this tablet. (also, the ac adapter doesn't plug all the way into the jack. It sticks out slightly. It looks weird)Really, that's about the only con I could think of because I really like this tablet. It's fast, it was cheap (62 dollars), the placements are a little on the weird side, but the fact that it's so cheap and is comparable to my high end tablets, I'd definitely recommend buying this. Just keep in mind that the battery life is probably not the greatest, but you really can't beat the features for such a cheap price.Edit- May, 13th, 2013I'm still very happy with my tablet and still stand by my review. I'd definitely buy another one. Anyway...The battery life is variable. It really depends on how bright the screen is and since there's no way to adjust the contrast other than an app extension, I'd estimate it around 3- 3 and a half hours max. (That's considering the fact that Wi-fi is on, sound is used and the device isn't on a charger)The good thing about this tablet is that although the battery life isn't the best, it will charge really fast. (Barely takes 30 minutes to get it near full charge.)I'm actually thinking of having a battery transplant done to this tablet.Also, I had a question e-mailed to me about the date and time display on this tablet. The problem with the date/time is the fact that you have to manually set it. You really shouldn't have to set the time/date being that it's google play ready and the Wi-Fi connection usually takes care of that.Update- (July, 10th, 2013)Tablet is still going strong. I actually used it to play Rockpacalypse and it runs the game good. Still haven't had any issues with this tablet.

Reviews.Title: PLEASE DO NOT BUY!!!
Reviews.Author: Porsha Jones
Reviews.Content: Alldaymall(TM) 7-inch Capacitive Touch Screen Android 4.0 Tablet PC with Allwinner A13 1.0GHz 512MB/4GB WiFi Front-camera (Black)First of all, I ordered 2 of these for my 5yr old and 3yr old who both know how to work tablets very well. At this price I was not expecting miracles but I thought that they would at least work for more than one day. Wow! I have never been more compelled to write a review as I am now.When we first received the tablets (fast and packaged well) the kids were so excited. They came dead so that meant a few hours of charge time. The chargers are apparently not made for the tablet because they do not go down all the way (weird). One of the chargers just simply did not work at all. So I charged them both with the other charger.At first they both worked fine but about an hour into using them the screens began to flicker and the graphics turned black and faded away. BIG DISAPPOINTMENT!Please DO NOT BUY THIS TABLET! THEY ARE PURE CRAP!I will just spend more to get Kindle Fires so at least my kids won't have to be broken-hearted again!Please don't ignore the bad reviews like I did. I REPEAT:THEY ARE CRAP!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great for what it is
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I bought this little tablet for my 6 year old to be able to get online to do some of the educational activities that her school supports as well as be able to play some games and read books.  I have to update the flash player I think, because some of the webpages don't perform correctly.  I'm not really too terribly surprised by that though.The screen is not very sensitive, but that's to be expected, I think, at this extremely low price, so I'm not really going to take anything off on that. The only reason I deducted a star is that the screen IS extremely scratch prone.  My 6 year old has used it for a total of about 2 1/2 hours at this point and the screen has a dozen or more fine scratches on it.  (fruit ninja)  Given that this tablet is mainly going to be used by a kid I should have known to get a screen protector, but I didn't think about it.  Still though, I would never have expected it to be scratched so easily.Other than that, I really don't have any serious complaints.  Took a while for the Google Play Store to come up.  It just stayed there loading for more than an hour, and I wasn't sure it was ever going to come up, but just as I was giving up on it for the night, it came up.  (causing me to lose another hour of sleep haha)The camera isn't very good, but I didn't expect it to be.  Again though, this is for a kid, and as I am writing this, she's running around with her sister taking videos of anything she can find. (including me writing this)Audio is actually pretty good.  It's actually a bit louder than I would have expected it to be, and it's pretty clear. No complaints there at all.Alldaymall was surprisingly very speedy on delivery.  I ordered the tablet and it couldn't have been more than 2 - 3 hours later Amazon sent me an email that said my order had shipped.  I was pretty skeptical that it was accurate, but I checked later that night and it had already been scanned by the carrier.  The order was scheduled for April 3rd - 5th but it arrived on the 1st. I was pretty pleased by that to say the least.  In fact I ordered a protective cover (no screen protector) at the same time to go with it that was being shipped by Amazon, and it didn't SHIP until the 1st.  I would give the seller 5+ stars.  The tablet came in the original packaging wrapped in 2 sets of shipping material 1 UPS bubble envelope and a USPS shipping bag (no box, I was a little surprised by this, but it turned out ok).OK well seeing how this is only the first full day that I've had the tablet, these are my first impressions and I'll update this review after we have gotten to know it a little better.Update: After about a week now I thought I'd give an update.  I downloaded several interactive books from Amazon and they all performed well.  A couple of days ago my daughter was running across a parking lot and CRASH the tablet falls out of her hands and goes skidding across the asphalt.  I figured it was toast, but other than some scratches on the back where it skidded and a scuffed corner where it impacted, the tablet works fine.  Says a little something for durability in my book!::Update::Thanks to a comment made by another member, I found out that there is a nearly invisible shipping protector on the screen.  That's what was scratched not the screen.  Upgraded review to 5 stars, because even though the tablet isn't a great performer, it's not expensive either.

Reviews.Title: the perfect lil tablet
Reviews.Author: DivaBrown
Reviews.Content: This tablet was a replacement but I have to say it sounds better than the one it replaced that is the speakers and it dose more than I could have thought if you are looking for a 7". Tablet this is the one and at a great price. I just love it

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware!!!
Reviews.Author: Peter Iversen
Reviews.Content: It is August 1 - this tablet stopped working today.I have hardly used it - just downloaded 2 apps to read books and one book.  Today I was using the calculator for some volunteer work and it just quit!I charged it in the morning and now - nothing.  The tablet does not respond to anything.  Recharging or - anything.I expected it to be simple and did not have a lot of heavy duty tasks for something that only cost $63.00 - but I did hope it would last for more than 6 weeks!  Lots of things I can get for $10 a week that would be much more gratifying!  The "warranty' expired 11 days ago!BUYER BEWARE - there is no recourse when something like this just dies - only thing I can do now is use it as a paperweight.How disappointing.  This was my entry into the tablet age - a stepping stone to... whatever - and now...So - is there anyone at Amazon who reads this?  Anyone who wants to be accountable for the business they run - or is it the fault of the Chinese company that made this piece of junk.Time will tell...

Reviews.Title: pretty good
Reviews.Author: frank dye
Reviews.Content: I got this cause it was a great price for a "quad core", but to find out that other dual core tablets will outperform this particular processor. so just do your homework. it works good and the battery life is just ok. i watched a movie and was left with 36% battery. so its not great. the screen is responsive and overall i like the tab. i like the charging options, either micro usb or the charger it comes with. thats nice. no bluetooth to connect other speakers or keyboards. the built in speaker will leave you wanting more sound. on a budget it will be a fun toy. and the "8gb" is actually just over 5gbs usable. i wouldnt buy another one. but on the other hand glad i got it. hope this helped.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Shawn D Koga
Reviews.Content: Bought 2, my fiancé and I both use these every day. Would have no problem recommending this product to my friends

Reviews.Title: usable. comes with root
Reviews.Author: Joey Hess
Reviews.Content: This tablet was a pleasant surprise, since it comes with root access built in. Just go to Storage, enable MTP, connect a USB cable, and "adb shell" will present a root@android prompt, which apparently has full permissions to do anything you desire with the hardware you just bought.(It's a sad state of affairs where full access to hardware you own is not guaranteed.)As far as the hardware goes, it seems acceptable for what it is. Battery life seems unlikely to go much over 2 hours. Having only a front-facing camera limits the utility of the tablet some. Built-in storage is limited; only 2.65 gb are free once annoying preloaded games are uninstalled. Hardware seems reasonably solid for the price.

Reviews.Title: It Ain't On Fire, But It'll Keep Ya Warm
Reviews.Author: Technophilos
Reviews.Content: OK, it's a cheap tablet computer. Find the right apps and it works fine. It initially had some power and wireless issues, but, as a previous reviewer said, use a screen dimmer and blanker app and you'll get better battery life and less heat. My wireless issues went away with a reboot too. Hey, I thought ya didn't have to do that with Linux! Oh yeah, it's "almost Linux" - aka Android. Oh well.  Mine came with Android 4.1, so I'm that much more happy with it. It definitely needs a protective case though.  The screen is a bit better than OK. Once dimmed, it's quite usable. It plays movies clearly without any fuzz or jitter. It surfs the web (well, Firefox does...) It comes with all the USB plugs you'll need too. The sound is a bit low - but clear. Hey, whaddya expect from a speaker the size of a tictac?  The battery life is its defining characteristic. It's short. Unless you bring a charger, it ain't gonna be entertaining you with movies while you're out deer hunting... It does, however, come with a bunch of irritable birds installed. Boy are they fun!  So, for the price of dinner for two at an midscale sit-down restaurant, you get a tablet computer. Pick one.

Reviews.Title: Does more than what I expect.
Reviews.Author: James R. Boffenmyer
Reviews.Content: I originally purchased this product to read .pdf textbooks for my graduate classes. Though I had to upgrade to a later edition of Adobe, I can do what I needed with no problem. For the price, the tablet works just as well, if not, better than a friend of mine's kindle fire. It has the same features but without the heavy cost.I also purchased a case with the keyboard and a USB splitter, and the USB is able to support both a keyboard and a mouse, and you can use it just like a laptop computer. (Once you get used to the small keyboard).This is my first tablet, I've always used apple products and It was not difficult to take this out of the box and figure out how to use this.Overall, I'm quite pleased with this product, and so far, it's living up to my expectations for an electronic device.

Reviews.Title: I would endorse this product over most tablets in stores.
Reviews.Author: Sophie's Manager "Javier"
Reviews.Content: This tablet has a great potential to provide your recipient a chance to own a great tablet at a great price.  I love it and feel it will be my company's product for a long time until 10" tablets drop in price or Chips become even more advanced for tablets.

Reviews.Title: awesome product
Reviews.Author: todaniels71
Reviews.Content: i got this just because the specs were so good.....when i got it in the mail i was like i hope i hope i hope..... got it fully charged and downloaded the one thingi really wanted to see if it would work thats magic jack free for android now i have gotten rid of my smartphone and landline using my new phone tab on wireless....wayyy less wires and the other cool thing is that it has an email alert.......you can choose which one you want out of alot.....the only problem is that halfway thru the day i have to charge the android but that only takes a little while.......other than that ive been giving everyone i knowreferalls to get one.....theyre awesome man...

Reviews.Title: Tablet okay good service
Reviews.Author: Mackmario8
Reviews.Content: i bought this tablet and when i got it it worked right out of the box it played almost all the apps at full speed. i had to return nmine though do to a bad battery, but service was excellent quick replies and good help.

Reviews.Title: Quick service
Reviews.Author: nmcafee
Reviews.Content: Quick service and I am very pleased with the tablet.  SInce I received it I havent put it downn.  Really nice for the price.

Reviews.Title: nooo
Reviews.Author: kory
Reviews.Content: I got this product thinking it would be great it only responds half of the time and it is very slow ,I tried subway surfers and I kept running into the first thing that popped up and every app takes forever to load you have to toutch the app at least 3 times for it to open then you have to wait at least 5 minutes for it to load its not just the internet that's slow its the entire device

Reviews.Title: Great tablet! Better than expected.
Reviews.Author: V. Behan
Reviews.Content: Other good reviews say a lot. Works well for my needs. I was so surprised at how well this little tablet performs. I downloaded Netflix and You Tube apps and both work flawlessly. The wifi works from a fair distance away from my router, too. Nook app works flawlessly, too. SD micro card slot easy access to add more content. So much for such a small price.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: Roger J Johnson
Reviews.Content: Got this for my son, I am SUPER PLEASED with this. it functions as it said and the price... unbeatable!!!!!!!!  Im getting a second one.... for me!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: For the price this is a very good Tablet.
Reviews.Author: Poonman66
Reviews.Content: I bought Two one for me and one for my wife, she loves the big screen for Words With Friends. We are getting old.

Reviews.Title: For 8 year old
Reviews.Author: Shalyn Evans
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a replacement for my sons Coby Kyros tablet that cracked recently after just receiving it for Christmas. Even though he had his own tablet he always wanted mine because his didn't have google play or any games he really liked. I have a Samsung Galaxy and didnt want t to get broken. After reading plenty of reviews I ordered this tablet. It came very quickly, with in 2-3 days of order. It came with a screen protector and a stylus.  My son tried it out tonight and loves it. He was enjoying setting up his games on it that he had on mine. This was cheaper than the Coby tablet and I even like it better. Im thinking about getting a 2nd one when I can for my 5 year old so he will stop playing mine as well. Excellent product, excellent price.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: speeps
Reviews.Content: Just as good as a brand name tablet. No delay when using the touch screen (I expected the screen response to be slow for a cheaper product). Everything opens fast. No complaints. Highly recommended for price.

Reviews.Title: Good tablet great price
Reviews.Author: Light
Reviews.Content: Bought this tablet for my mom so she could read email, thats about all she needed it for. Works well for simple tasks, but was suprised when you could watch full HD movies in perfect playback and play angry birds no problem. Didn't expect it to be that good. Actually is a decent tablet, a little slower than my girls "google nexus 7" but that is to be expected, thats not what you would buy this tablet for. Anyone who is a light user or just getting into tablets this is a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Great for Kids
Reviews.Author: anonymous
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my kids (10 and 8) to play games on. We have several laptops/desktops in the family but this is the first tablet. Some PC games have new version in apps so we want to have a tablet to try those games. The instruction booklet indicates a welcome screen to set up the tablet. It didn't have that. It came with a locked screen which took me a while to figure out how to unlock it. After that, the tablet works great. The battery only lasts 1.5-2 hours. A couple of apps in Play Store did not show up on screen although I could see the files through my laptop. Maybe the version of Android on the tablet is incompatible. We are not serious users so this is good enough. It is great for the price.

Reviews.Title: 7 - inch Tablet
Reviews.Author: JOHN T SMITH
Reviews.Content: For the price, I like it. I'm new as a senior but I will accomplish this piece of equipment. Only fault that I have is the manual, why is it so small. The print is to small. Is there a full size one out there. Want to save my eyes.

Reviews.Title: IT'S JUST GREAT
Reviews.Author: Sara
Reviews.Content: I love having a tablet. it's good for somebody's first tablet r ur 5th tablet. it's a great size for me.I want to think Alldaymall for letting me get a tablet for $68.99

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: soledad
Reviews.Content: Better than I expected. Graphics are good, sound is loud and clear, and all works very fast (at least compared with my old 512MB/4G tablet). I can say that now I have a useful tablet again, and at a very good price.

Reviews.Title: Bad quality
Reviews.Author: B. Vidolov
Reviews.Content: Pros: Thin, lightCons: Very poor qualityThe item arrived very fast and the price was good, but the device quality is really bad. Examples: the gravity sensor that is used to change orientation doesn't work. I installed a few apps that track it and they detect the sensor, but confirm that the sensor simply doesn't work. As result, the only way I can use the device is as in landscape mode.The accelometer detects some of the movements, but has very low accuracy/sensitivity. The device cannot distinguish whether headphones are plugged in or not. In Skype you need to switch to speaker manually at each call, as it defaults to non-connected headphones. Camera is bad too, but it matches the expectations.Finally, the externals: the charger doesn't even go all the way in and a big metal piece is sticking half way out. Obviously, they used charger for a different device. The glass of the screen is not glued evenly, so it looks like it has peeled off on some edges. I wouldn't recommend.Update: I gave it to my relatives overseas and they now say that the screen cracked while the device was left charging. The charger didn't even fit well, so I won't be surprised if it has overheated due to wrong charger being shipped with the device. Unfortunately, I cannot even return it, as the device is on the other side of the earth.

Reviews.Title: Barely works- not all apps will install and work correctly.
Reviews.Author: Bert
Reviews.Content: The device arrived packaged well and looked good enough. It powered on with no troubles and was surprisingly responsive. The viewing angles are pretty awful; in landscape mode, it looks mostly fine, but in portrait mode you don't get much viewing angle to work with. If you tilt it to the side by about 30 degrees the colors will fade out on you. All in all, the hardware seemed to be par for the course for a $70 tablet. I was not disappointed nor was I blown away by the hardware; if I was simply web surfing it would probably be fine. I didn't try streaming any videos with it.However, there is some problem with the OS that doesn't let all apps work correctly on it. I was planning on using this as a dedicated Pandora alarm clock by using Tasker and Pandora to automate it. For the price it would have been a great deal, but Tasker wouldn't run at all. It would install from the Play Store just fine, but would always return an error when attempting to run- it wouldn't load at ALL. I Googled around a lot, and it appears that this type of thing is a common problem with certain tablets. It has something to do with not having the Google Maps libraries installed, and no matter what I tried it absolutely wouldn't let Tasker start up. I am returning this tablet and going with a brand name I recognize.Summary: It may or may not run the apps you want it to. Build quality is decent, but I wouldn't expect it to hold up well to daily usage in the long term. Light usage should be fine. Unfortunately I cannot recommend this tablet as I don't know if it has the OS installed correctly or not, so any apps that I would want to run may not work at all.

Reviews.Title: For my granddaughter
Reviews.Author: John Chladek
Reviews.Content: The price was reasonable then the other tablets out there.  It has for me the great features i was looking for. My granddaughter loved this tablet. she was able to play the games she loves on the tablet. Overall a nice tablet for the price .  Thank you.

Reviews.Title: The product was a disappointment
Reviews.Author: C.J. Sallee
Reviews.Content: It stopped working after a week. I wasn't pleased with the product. I wish things would have worked out, but stuff happens.

Reviews.Title: Semi Good
Reviews.Author: BigRayne "Rayne Armstrong"
Reviews.Content: It is a great pad to have but there are some downsides to it.  The battery is constantly being drained and you cannot update the android software.

Reviews.Title: Very nice!!
Reviews.Author: Emily hollingshead
Reviews.Content: I've gotten pretty attached to this little tablet, though it's a little slow and it doesn't pick up wifi connection very well. It's got plenty of memory and it's durable.  (I'm very clumsy and drop it all the time, and it's still fine). Great for gaming. It may not be the best if you're looking for a tablet for work, but it's great for kids and teens.

Reviews.Title: I love the tablet
Reviews.Author: Nicole Murphy
Reviews.Content: Had a few issues at first and they had so send me a replacement tablet but I can not say enough about the seller AllDayMall has the best customer service I have ever delt with they were prompt with responses and got everything sorted out! A+++++++++ I would definently buy from them again and would recomend them for sure!!!!

Reviews.Title: You Get More Than You Pay For
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: I've had this tablet for three days now, so of course first impressions will last onto my review. If anything changes I will be sure to add it onto my review.This is also my first tablet, so I cannot compare very well to other tablets.In the box is a neatly packaged tablet, a self-explanatory user manual (it appears to be translated so the English is a little iffy, but understandable), a USB cable to connect to the computer, and a USB converter thing that allows you to use USB devices on the tablet. I tried connecting my iPod there, but it just charges without anything special popping up. And then there's the AC adapter for standard charging.First off, this 7-inch tablet is really fit for anyone's budget. If you don't want to be spending 3x the amount of money on those higher end tablets, then this is extremely suitable. As far as I'm concerned, this tablet can do anything the higher end tablets can do, but with less battery life and slower speed (this tablet lags quite easily from the use of some applications).The gravity aspect works well; it's also a bit slow but it works. The brightness is a huge battery waster, so I always tune down the lighting. At the lowest brightness setting, this tablet will work for about 4 hours max (on the browser, searching, watching videos, etc.). I'm sure the battery will leak much faster on brighter settings.This tablet comes with Google Play (and Angry Birds) so you can download all of your familiar apps on this thing. My only issue is that this tablet has very low storage space, so you can only fiddle around with several apps before uninstalling them and replacing them with new ones to conserve space. There's also a TF slot for anyone with a micro-SD card who needs more storage space, but since I do plan on getting a higher end tablet, I believe the kids can handle several apps and lose interest quickly enough to replace them.The audio is fine with headphones, the quality is unchanging. But the speakers are pretty bad so I'd say use external speakers as a substitute or headphones.In conclusion I can easily say that the price for this tablet is very reasonable, but I think I would spend more money on a larger storage, faster speed, and a longer battery life if I ever plan to use a tablet in a more significant setting. As for now, this tablet serves as a great substitute to the computer for the kids on the go and it's very thin and light so it's a great choice.I recommend this product to anyone who doesn't expect too much from a cheap tablet or wants to have a "starter tablet".5 stars for fast shipping and a great product.

Reviews.Author: Roger Jackson
Reviews.Content: My son purchased this tablet with money he earned over the entire summer. After less than 2 months it started to have problems turning on but we were able to work through the glitch. He has only had it for 2 months and a couple weeks and it will no longer turn on. We found a video online where we could perform a hard reset (because apparently others have a problem with it too). We did the hard reset and it went through the process just as it did on the video, however, and unfortunately, for us it still would never make it through the opening screen. I'm not one to bail out my kids but I feel a little responsible for this because I helped him research and pick out this tablet so it looks like I'm on the hook to get him a new one. (Definitely not this model.) I knew it wasn't going to be a top of line tablet but for his budget and use it seemed perfect. However, I did not expect such a short and faulty life. I have also tried to find some kind of tech support assistance but have found none. Some have had luck with this tablet. Purchase at your own risk.

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware!
Reviews.Author: D. Sabean
Reviews.Content: It worked OK for a couple of weeks, then wouldn't charge.  Customer Service is decent, but you have to send numerous emails to communicate with people who only have the most basic grasp on the English language.  They replaced the charger, and all was well for a month.  Then the tablet bricked itself while it was turned off for the night.  Again with the numerous emails until communication was achieved.  They tried to send me several different firmware files (they didn't know which one would work!), but no explanation on how to install.  Finally they replaced the tablet and even reimbursed my shipping expense.  A month went by, and it was working fine, then the inner screen cracked while it was put away for the night!  Back to the numerous emails, which boiled down to them wanting me to ship it to CHINA for repairs which would cost $30 for the inner screen repair - half of what I paid for this non-durable piece of crap - plus the cost of shipping it to China.  I finally gave up and bought a Kindle Fire (which I highly recommend, by the way!), and my problems with this junk tablet are over.  I am still out the major hassle and the $63 I paid for it, but I guess I have to chalk that up to an expensive lesson learned the hard way.

Reviews.Title: Great value.
Reviews.Author: David D. Dixon
Reviews.Content: I wasn't expecting much here, given the price, but they've worked great.  We plug a corded USB laser barcode scanner into these, and use them with a web-based inventory management system.  They'd be too slow for my taste as a tablet for web browsing, videos, etc., but in this application they work fine.  Many tablets much more expensive don't have a USB host controller like this one.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product
Reviews.Author: Kerry
Reviews.Content: I've wanted a tablet for a while. I was waiting for technology to improve and prices to drop. My son bought this item as a gift. I love this tablet. I had done research as I always do before purchasing electroincs. This tablet exceeded my expectations. I love everything about this item. The screen is just the right size, the wifi zooms, the apps works perfectly, music, camera, video-recorder and video player works great. Excellent tablet at a great price! If you are in the market for tablet especially if this is you're first time owning a tablet you can't go wrong. I highly recommend this product. Also Iwould suggest purchasing the tablet cover, it comes with a keyboard and proctects the tablet.

Reviews.Title: Loving it.
Reviews.Author: June B.
Reviews.Content: This was my first entry into tablet computing.  I did  not have, or wish to spend, an exorbitant amount on the purchase.  After surfing the web for info and prices, I settled on this one.  My initial experience with it was great, but after about a week, the screen froze and I couldn't use it any longer.  I contacted the seller, "Edge Cutter", in an Email explaining the prob.  They requested that I return the tablet for replacement, or refund.  Also, after they received the return, I received a call from their staff offering a refund or replacement.  I opted for replacement which arrived 2 days later.  I am totally pleased with the replacement, it is even nicer than the original.  I use it constantly.  I have had no probs with the apps, downloading, and etc.  I am a newbie, but it does exactly what I wanted, which is to surf, use it for facebook, reading ebooks, and  playing games wherever I happen to be.  It is much nicer and easier than carrying around my netbook.  I am very, very pleased with its performance and have reccomended it to family and friends.

Reviews.Title: Simply didn't work!
Reviews.Author: Patricia Cox
Reviews.Content: The package came as expected, the wrapping seemed secure, but after charging the unit it was very difficult to get it turned on. Once I powered it down, because the battery charge only lasted 30 mins after the first use, I could not get it started again after a second recharge attempt. The light on the charger was lit, but the battery scroll that was described in the barely legible instruction manual did not occur at all. I noticed too that the charger did not seat well into the unit at all; perhaps this was part of the problem; I will never know for sure. Regardless of the cause, it did not work nor did it meet my expectations. I was very disappointed since I was looking forward to having my first tablet and using it on the go. Now I have to order another one but will most likely try another brand and will buy it locally as well so I don't have to go through all of this again.

The colors are brighter and more apps work on this. Ive had no problem with angry birds, netflix, minecraft, etc. Now, if you are looking for something comparable to an IPAD, youre not gonna find it here but if youre looking for an inexpensive tablet for your kid to play games on, this will do the trick. :)

Reviews.Content: I bought this tablet for my daughter, I received yesterday and has it packed for pick-up today. It appears to be used, it has bubbles around the screen and a long scratch on it.  I was expecting a new one.

Reviews.Title: My ATM7029 Review
Reviews.Author: Luci
Reviews.Content: Overall we are very happy with this tablet purchase. Our first tablet was a KOBO VOX, 800 MHZ, 512RAM/8gig HDD. This tablet is very responsive with little lag. Game play is similar in speed to playing on our PC. Netflix plays smoothly. "Touch" on the screen is what I call normal, not too hard and not many accidental clicks. The only thing I miss on my VOX is the screen. With the VOX sitting in bed beside my partner I could easily see his screen as though I was sitting directly in front of it. With the ATM7029 looking at it from the same angle the screen is washed out grayish looking. So be prepared to get a case/stand for optimal viewing. There were very few 'stock' apps installed and I missed some from the VOX. Thankfully getting apps is easy and knowing what I liked on the VOX was a big help. So all in all we would purchase this tablet again it seems to be a decent mid range table.

Reviews.Title: poor q
Reviews.Author: Beckie McLarty
Reviews.Content: This was a disappointing gift for my grandson. I guess you get what you pay for. Was unusuable after afew weeks.

Reviews.Title: Don't waste your money!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Laura
Reviews.Content: Buyers beware delivered to me on April 8th not working right less than 3 months later! To top that Amazon says it's not elegible for return or replacement! So do not waste your money on a disposable tablet! It did work good for the first 3 months, but I expected a whole lot more time for what it cost!

Reviews.Title: PERFECT for children
Reviews.Author: Danielle C.
Reviews.Content: I have 3 sons. They are 11, 6, and 5. They all wanted tablets, and I was having a hard time deciding on something that I thought would hold up to these 3, be reasonably priced, and still do everything they wanted it too. They had been saving their own money for months waiting for me to find something. ( I don't think it's ever too early to teach kids the value of a dollar and they had to earn their own money) I looked for probably the better part of a month. My kids were all interested in different games. This tablet however had proved to be perfect for all 3 of my kids. They play all the games they want. The tablets came installed with fruit ninja and angry birds. I did purchase 3 cheap cases for the tablets as a little added security, but all in all they are perfect. They've been dropped, sat on, whatever else you think 3 boys can do to something, and they're still working perfectly. BEST tablet I could have purchased at a reasonable price for 3 children!!!

Reviews.Title: For the price - Excellent (so far)

Reviews.Content: First day with the tablet and very impressed. Everything works and works smoothly. The thing runs acceptably fast, loads web pages quickly, no problems with the apps that I've down loaded (netflix, nook, office suite, backgrounds, lookout). Physical feel of the device is of good quality.The documentation is slim. A little booklet written in english as a second language. So you have to poke around a bit to figure out how to delete the bloatware (I don't need the Fishy Game, Fruit Ninja, the Shrek movie trailer and whatever that song was that was loaded on it - okay, I kept Angry Birds)...Bottom line... For $65 bucks this thing is awesome... Is it an iPad, no.... But, for what it is and what it does it's an excellent purchase and value.Again, first day. It might all crap out tomorrow, but right now, very happy with the purchase...

Reviews.Content: imy daughter ordered this had it two months and the lcd screen shattered. before this although it worked well with no problems. but dont set it down on a hard suface.

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: Rebecca
Reviews.Content: the product that I received got scratched easily and keeps freezing up. it keeps refusing to work right. I don't like what I paid for.

Reviews.Title: Not Good
Reviews.Author: Xochitl
Reviews.Content: I bought the tablet knowing it was not top noch but I didn't think it was this bad! It arrived a couple days after I ordered it so I was happy about that. But after 3 days of using it the screen was all scratched (thanks to fruit ninja) I put it to charge and the charger was loose! Then on the 4th day after it had charged all night I go and turn it on and all I get is a white screen! I tried contacting the company so I can return it and neve got an answer on the phone and never got a reply to my email. Very unhappy about throwing $70 dollars away!

Reviews.Author: Kevin Rhodes
Reviews.Content: It just sucked.  The power cord did not fit. The USB connection was out of alignment and the battery drained quickly.  You get exactly what you pay for.

Reviews.Title: Great Bargain
Reviews.Author: Kera
Reviews.Content: Great little tablet, love it so far. Few knicks though.Some of the apps crash.The speaker is very hard to hear out of.The camera is low quality.Internet can be slow and click on other things than what you were directing too. (Definately recommend a capactice screen stylus.)But hey for $65 I can deal with those few mishaps! We all know $65 won't buy you a perfect tablet but it sure does buy you a nice one! Very pleased with my purchase. :)One last thing, shipping was horrible! Took 8 days to come in! And it shipped very close to the state I live in.-Update:Well, this tablet was working great for me but after having it a couple weeks found some more problems.I tried to video chat on both Oovoo & Skype and they were both horrible. The camera & speaker are just absolutely terrible! The pictures look very low resolution and the front view camera was the whole reason I decided to get this tablet. Very dissapointed.Tablet itself is nice but just completely bad battery life, and the charger that came with it will not charge it. Luckily, I had one to fit it from an old phone I had.I would recommend this to someone just looking for a tablet to play games, or maybe use internet but those looking for a tablet for webcam and picture taking, also to listen to music. I definately do not recommend this one!

Reviews.Title: Exellent Product!
Reviews.Author: Enrique Rojas
Reviews.Content: Good device on a low budget. I had my reservation about getting this device, but, I was surprise by all the features it provides. The battery holds for a few hours, but, its not a device that you are going to spend a lot of time in it. I will strongly recommend this device for a family that is looking for a device for a young one.

Reviews.Title: Great starter tablet!
Reviews.Author: Shareelew
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my computer-illiterate husband as a tool for him to check his own email.  It was so simple that I watched a YouTube video, set up his email and loaded a couple of apps, and then started training him.  Now he knows how to start it up all by himself, read his email, and delete what he doesn't need anymore.  Has a touch very similar to my iPad.  In fact, sometimes I prefer the smaller format and I have already borrowed it from him on occasion.Hubby will still need a few more lessons, but I am simply thrilled that he can check his own mail by himself!  And he is proud of himself too.  Great starter item and reasonably priced.

Reviews.Content: The tablet didn't work, wouldn't stay on.  I sent it back and bought one from Walmart for the same price which is working fine.

W/O these installed in the tablet when you download an app you get someone else game in progress. I.e team lava games can't install any of them. Just tried plants vs zombies and having issues with that one too and I paid for that game. When the COMPANY responds I will update my comment. But for now its a No in my book.

Reviews.Title: perfect

Reviews.Title: great little tablet..
Reviews.Author: elay06
Reviews.Content: It actually came day later and my little one was getting impatient, too me, not a big deal. I am happy with this tablet, what do you expect for under 50$ I downloaded some music for my 8 year old son and was pleasantly surprise how fast it was. He uses it for you tube,Netflix and music as well as couple games. I will buy him the bigger memory card to store more stuff. Great little tablet for a kiddo. I'm happy with it. It has everything you would pay for more expensive one. Wi fi, Bluetooth,sd card slot. So far ,so good.

Reviews.Title: Poor quality and not recommend
Reviews.Author: Rick Z
Reviews.Content: It's a used one. Touchscreen is not good for typing.I cannot start the tablet now. Poor quality.not recommend.

Reviews.Title: Not so great
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: I bought this just to read my online newspaper but while it connects wirelessly at home I have not been able to connect at work or at my favorite coffee shop. It's a bust.

Reviews.Title: Stay Away
Reviews.Author: Kerry
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet last June. At first it seemed okay but there were always underlying issues. Certain apps froze, it took forever to go online, the battery died very fast just to name a few. Soon this tablet became a total nightmare. I was constantly contacting tech support and most of the time they wasn't able to resolve my issue. I was getting extremely frustrated and about six months later (none of these issues were ever resolved), I was unable to update or download apps. Finally the tablet decided to convert from english to an asian language. One good thing came out of this, the company gave me a full refund. I would stay away from this tablet. I spent an additional $20 and purchased a very good tablet. I've had it four months no issues and I love it.

Reviews.Title: poor
Reviews.Author: robert
Reviews.Content: it stoped working 36 days after I got it an square trade wont fix or replace it under the warrenty I paid for thay suck the big one .

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Destinykaderly
Reviews.Content: It was good at first but after a week it stopped working !!! I wish I wouldn't of wasted my money on this I would have been better of going to Walmart

Reviews.Title: 7 inch tablet
Reviews.Author: marlon
Reviews.Content: this item was well made. the camera is very clean. unlike other tablets.it is how ever moving a bit slow for my taste, its knew so i did not expect this defect so soon.

Reviews.Title: No a good deal.
Reviews.Author: Alfonso L. Puerta "Technomaniac"
Reviews.Content: We got this product mostly for the price but the true is that it is not worth it. It is painfully slow and the signal is poor.It barely makes a good toy.

Reviews.Title: good product
Reviews.Author: milagros cuevas
Reviews.Content: good product, worth the price, my son is happy, and also because I do not pay as much money as I thought

Reviews.Title: Crap crap crap
Reviews.Author: Sara Ladd
Reviews.Content: Wanted a basic tablet for my son to play angry birds and temple run on. This tablet couldn't even do that!! Battery life was pathetic.

Reviews.Title: Keep your receipt. Not worth the trouble.
Reviews.Author: Dorothy Stephens
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my granddaughters for CHRISTMAS, one lasted exactly 30days before frying.  The fact that I bought it in advance so as not to miss out, meant it's 90 days since purchase and I must eat the lost. I foolishly had bought 4 of them and know it won't be long. They have to be plugged all the time because they only hold a charge for a short time.

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: Amanda
Reviews.Content: This tablet was pretty crappy and my fiancé was disappointed in the purchase. We ended up returning and getting something with a little more quality.

Reviews.Title: Got it for a 6 year old.
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my 6 year old knowing she would eventually drop it.  The device was so slow, that she would eventually end up using my wife's phone rather than this.  The battery life was horrible.  It would last for about 2 hours before she would have to charge it.  The micro usb connection was the first thing to break, so we had to use the included power adapter that never seemed to fit right.  Then she eventually dropped it 1 foot to the ground and it broke.  The screen is not glass, so it only separated into the 2 front and back halves.  After many tears, and a few minutes for daddy to put it back together for her, we eventually ended up spending twice as much for a much better one with 10 times the battery life and processor.  Unless you pick this thing up for $20, don't bother.

Reviews.Title: The product is good for its price
Reviews.Author: Pina Campo
Reviews.Content: The product is good for its price. Sometimes hangs on google play and it complains that deserve a reboot but you can search for other download options.The device performs well, touch screen responds well and has a good battery life.

Reviews.Title: Very Good Tablet
Reviews.Author: Ezra J. Chumley
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet to replace the prior model I gave away to my Sis which was similiar I thought! It works very well, But I do have a problem with the display icons being smaller than the one I had before. My icons on huge size is still smaller than the large size setting on the one I gave away. Both are from Alldaymall.com and 4.0 Android tablets. The live wallpapers are very limited compared to the other one as well. Setting it up was a little more complicated than the prior one too! This model does have a better Wi-Fi connection than the previous model, so that is a good plus! Overall it is a good tablet and works very well!

Reviews.Title: Horrid
Reviews.Author: G. Wichman
Reviews.Content: Showed up cracked and never used it. Worst 70dollars i ever spent . and i dont wanna use insurance (which i purchased) i just wanna take it back.

Reviews.Title: Alldaymall tablet
Reviews.Author: Sharon Bain
Reviews.Content: I really didn't use it, its a birthday gift. I love the specs and I know it would be a great gift. With Alldaymall 7" Tablet  you could surf the net play games. The memory is pretty good. Besides it has wifi and a camera that's cool.

Reviews.Title: its okay
Reviews.Author: Travis Wayne Hensen
Reviews.Content: i had it for month i got to set it on the damn counter and the screen cracked but for the price i cant complain so if you get this tablet be careful with it

Reviews.Title: Get the Bundled Keyboard Case
Reviews.Author: Mudfarmer
Reviews.Content: Surprisingly useful for something so cheap. I wanted a screen a bit bigger than my android phone to read news feeds and emails over coffee. This runs all my favorite apps. Got the deal with the included keyboard case. I'm quite pleased. The keyboard case is excellent in quality and the keyboard works seamlessly. The tablet is protected and easy to carry around with the case. There is a great little prop on the back for hands-free reading. A lot more text shows than on my Samsung S4, so a lot less scrolling, more coffee swigging time. For the money you can't go wrong - get the bundle.

Reviews.Title: Hope you have a wonderful holiday and new year best of wishes
Reviews.Author: john mccloud
Reviews.Content: Thank you it is a wonderful holiday gift and my husband stole it from me and I had to by another one but thank you .

Reviews.Title: Don't buy this!
Reviews.Author: Casey T
Reviews.Content: Don't buy this. It is extremely slow with very few apps. I bought it for my 3 year old and still returned it. It also came from China so it cost me over $20 just to return it. What a waste of money!

Reviews.Title: it's ok
Reviews.Author: Gwyndolyn Cochran
Reviews.Content: This is an okay tablet for a kid or someone who won't use it much. It does how ever freeze up more often than I feel feel it should.

Reviews.Title: Please don't
Reviews.Author: CB
Reviews.Content: You generally get what you pay for. I bought this as a Christmas gift and thankfully decided to try it first. I was not impressed as it will nor run any of the pages I have to utilize for my college classes and when toy just try to surf the Internet it takes forever to load. ....I know it is not my internet service as a other devices work fine. I can keep it for very basic uses. ...facebook, candy crush,  etc but is not great. If you are going to get one of these check our nomorerack.com the one I got there is much better.

Reviews.Title: Waste of money
Reviews.Author: Wendy grim
Reviews.Content: I brought this product in September . It's been only two months an it needs to be repair first the sound disappeared now it want turn on at all . Very disappointed

Reviews.Title: Not too bad
Reviews.Author: Leslie E. Brisco
Reviews.Content: A decent product. Nothing spectacular about it though. It was what my son wanted. good price for the particular item

Reviews.Title: Shattered
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Gave this to my granddaughter.  It fell off the bed and shattered and now does not work at all.  We have had it less than 2 weeks.  It is a nice little tablet, but you must be very careful not to drop it.

Reviews.Title: works well but needs frequent recharging
Reviews.Author: Srul
Reviews.Content: works well but battery life is low, have to keep recharging when on wi-fi or games with graphics and sound. Otherwise it's a good machine comparable to the name brands.

Reviews.Title: Maybe good for a child to play with, but not much more than that
Reviews.Author: IronChefMIk
Reviews.Content: This thing is barely a toy. For $60 I was not expecting too much, I mostly wanted to see how much I would bother with using a tablet to see if I wanted to buy a more expensive tablet. The front facing camera on this does not work and there is not camera on the back. The tablet is extremly slow and only has a 2 gig hd meaning that you have a limited number of apps you can install. Fortunately it comes with a slot for a micro sd card. The charger it comes with is an odd adapter, fortunately you can also charge it with a micro usb charger if you have one. Because the device runs so slow you wont be doing much typing on it. I mostly use this as a Plex media remote. If you are just tying to do some simple webbrowsing or even netflex viewing this will work, but don't expect to use this to take notes for school or anything like that.If you do have a kid though this is probably what I would give them to play with.

Reviews.Title: I liked the very good quality product
Reviews.Author: jorge martinez
Reviews.Content: I liked the very good quality productI recommend buying that . very good good quality. I wanted. thank you thank you very much

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Brent
Reviews.Content: Great deal for the money and I got exactly what I wanted ! Need a cheap tablet this is it yo!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Pretty good for the price
Reviews.Author: Seanny boy
Reviews.Content: This is my first touch screen so without anything to compare it to, it does enough for me to justify having purchased it.

Reviews.Title: JUNK
Reviews.Author: Desiree Quirk
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for my younger daughters. The first issue I had was they did not keep there charge well. They used them for a couple of weeks and then one of them the charger would no longer fit in the tablet. I tried using the other charger and reallized it was the tablet itself. Then a week later almost the same happened to the other tablet, it would not charge correctly unless you wiggled the charger around! And soon after that also did not work.  Both my girls are waiting for me to have them fixed but it not worth my time or money to spend on these pieces of crap!! True that you get what you pay for!!!! I highly recommend that you spend alittle more money and get something that is better quality.B00AXWLFO0

Reviews.Title: cool
Reviews.Author: collin
Reviews.Content: the price was what attracted me to this and i think its worth it, cant do heavy work with it though but that alright, basically bought for gaming and if it brakes it it wouldn't be a bie invesment lost

Reviews.Title: Device is NOT useful to my work as it does not connect to We-Fi
Reviews.Author: Vicki
Reviews.Content: The tablet has  a number of things I like about it but there are some IMOPORTANT things that I am very distressed about!! Like I am unable to connect to internet so all of the taks I need to do requiring internet capability I am unable to do. I have Wi/-Fi in my home. It SHOWS me being connected. And yet it consistently says "webpage not available" no matter how many times or how many different sites I type in!!!  I have even had my 11 yr old IPod/DS whiz grandson try and help me as he has on my OTHER devices and he can't get it working either!!!

Reviews.Title: better then expected
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This is the second tablet that I have ordered. The last one was from China and I have to say I hated it. I returned it a week later. This one is great. It surpasses what I was expecting for the cost. I could NOT be happier. If you are looking for a tablet, this is the one you want.

Reviews.Title: It's worth the price
Reviews.Author: Omar Mohammed
Reviews.Content: For the price I didn't expect much and I got exactly what I expected.It did teach me to save and buy the better stuff

Reviews.Title: Not so bad
Reviews.Author: Lisa Hoshaw
Reviews.Content: Just received the tablet.  Seems to work fine.  The screen has terrible off-axis viewing.  Just a little to the side and you cant see anything.  The screen is a bit less responsive than I would like.  These are first impressions.

Reviews.Title: Horrible battery life
Reviews.Author: Oliver
Reviews.Content: Slow tablet but for the price it is about what I expect.  My real complaint is that the tablet dies after only a couple hours of use.  The batteries will die when it is on stand-by for a day or so.  The batteries will die after about two hours of use.

Reviews.Title: Good Product
Reviews.Author: Funky Funny
Reviews.Content: It was cool but my 4 years son broke the glass after a week. I'm planning to buy another one soon

Reviews.Title: You get what you pay for.
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Lee
Reviews.Content: The old adage, you get what you pay for, well that's true here.  The tablet arrived completely dead. I had to wait several hours for it to charge. I setup my email and got everything working, in about 2 hours the battery died. I charged it for 2 days and when I turned it on it booted up with a fault and when it reset itself it came up asking for a password. I was never able to get back into the tablet. It is now on its way back to the seller.I would not recommened you waste your time or money on cheep tablets. Spend a few more bucks and get you a good one.PS : The seller was very understanding and worked with me on the return transaction.  Only problem I now have to wait 30 to 40 days for my refund. Who ever heard of such a thing!

Reviews.Title: Wow!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: What an awesome little gizmo. Amazing buy for the price. Shipped super fast straight from China. My son is in love after his older Kindle Fire broke. This thing does all that could do and in HD. Great buy, I want one next.

Reviews.Title: No battery Life
Reviews.Author: grea
Reviews.Content: Easy to set up if only it had some battery life; still waiting now to even get 100% charged and that was 2 days ago. Price point cheap but sometime you pay for battery life I will have to buy a strong tablet to see better results

Reviews.Title: Meh
Reviews.Author: downsouthgagirl
Reviews.Content: Screen broke after one slight fall, onto the carpet. =/ It was sent back and refunded, as I decided maybe my 6 year old wasn't ready for a tablet quite yet.

Reviews.Title: Nice Table
Reviews.Author: ALBERT V.
Reviews.Content: Wow,  very nice and helpful tablet. my grandson loves it. easy to set up and quick start. camera works great for both videos and pictures

Reviews.Title: i like it
Reviews.Author: rexrex
Reviews.Content: Good no problems at all i wish it had gps and other thing like better camera video volume button hdmi output

Reviews.Title: Good value for money
Reviews.Author: Jama Basinger
Reviews.Content: Pros -- Easy to use and good value.  Nice picture qualityCons -- Battery doesn't seem to last long.  I bought the USB keyboard/case so it's easy to type.  Power cord seems a little "junky"

Reviews.Title: Its okay
Reviews.Author: Tamie
Reviews.Content: The tablet is a very small, easy to handle, and a simple entertainment. All though it can be a little slow, ( I do not have that many apps on mine ) Its a good device. My touch screen has cracked though, and once you do that, it is very hard to controll the touch settings anywhere. I suggest getting a warranty and taking very good care of the tablet. The camera is great and the storage on it is amazing.

Reviews.Title: Great price for a great device !!!
Reviews.Author: Jonathan Davis
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed of the many features this tablet has !!!This is a great tablet with a great price !!!

Reviews.Title: It's ok...
Reviews.Author: H. P.
Reviews.Content: Got this for my daughter.  The vendor we bought if from, got it to us in about 6 weeks (slow boat from China).  The screen initially had a distorted spot on it, which I kind of ignored.  After about 4 months she said it's just not working right.  That's been our experience on several of these really cheap tablets.

Reviews.Title: Wasn't what I had hoped
Reviews.Author: David J. Eng
Reviews.Content: I received the product with the microphone not functioning.Pros: Lightweight, great internet browsing experience, battery fully recharges in ~30 minutes.Cons: Heats up, Poor Battery Life, Feels CheapOverall: I wouldn't buy it. I rather shell the extra cash for a brand name tablet since it really gives you a different experience. I ended up getting a 1st gen Nexus 7 for about $100 more and am super satisfied with it!

Reviews.Title: not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: tyrone williams
Reviews.Content: this is a good tablet for the price. I really like it but my main problem with this tablet is that on the 2 tablet that I orderedthey both loss the sound while I was playing fruit ninja.

Reviews.Title: it's ok
Reviews.Author: Mr. harrison
Reviews.Content: Very glitchy light damage on screen, looked new but saw signs of ware and tare,will be buying a different version.Would hold a full charge less than an half-hour.charge socket was damaged, and manual has spelling mistakes.

Reviews.Title: Stopped working
Reviews.Author: GENE
Reviews.Content: I was trying to take a picture and the screen just froze and won't move. I have tried to cut it off and start it againg. No Luck. I have been had. I just got this darn thing. I read some of the review and should have heeded them. What do I do now. Aby suggestions?

Reviews.Title: I like this Tablet
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: Hello. I finally got the tablet Yesterday. I really like it I have not found any of the issues other people have had with it. Yeah the power cord sticks out a bit but thats just nit picking. I am able to get onto the internet and pretty much look at anything. My only real issue is the music. Seems it fills up fast with the music which is one of many reason why I wanted it, So I can put music on it. And for some reason it doesn't recognize the music. If anyone knows if you can change that please help me out. If there is an app I can store music on instead that would be great. To free up space. But so far so good. I have most of the apps I would want downloaded. I can skype, kik and anything else. It's like phone without actually being one. Which is cool. Would be cool if it connected to something outside my home so I can be on internet all the time. but that would probably cost me money. I give this product a 5 star anyway.  I am still getting to know it. Again my only problem is the music fills up fast. I'm not able to put all the music I want on it. And it lists most of the music as unknown. They're off CD's. Hope you enjoy it. I recommend buying one. I'm not a fan of the I products. I'm just not. I see a lot of off branded stuff that works just as great. Like this one. the 7 inch through me off. It's a lot bigger than I had imagine. The touch screen makes me feel like Ironman with being able to shrink stuff and move all about. If anyone reads this and can help me out with the music let me know. If there is a way to get more music and have it readable would be great to.

Reviews.Title: alldaymall
Reviews.Author: zack
Reviews.Content: It work good. I like it that I can put it in my back pocket but still. See the screen

Reviews.Title: Surrogate
Reviews.Author: Brett
Reviews.Content: I purchased this for a friend of my daughter's as a graduation present, and has not expressed any complaints so far. She is part of the digital world and uses it for everything. She is very picky about everything so since she hasn't complained I have to assume she is happy with this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Kinda pokey, but a good value
Reviews.Author: dhrachth
Reviews.Content: The viewing angle on the screen is kinda narrow.  The battery life isn't great.  It runs a bit slow.However, it does work.  I can check my email, watch a youtube vid, and play a few rounds of Angry Birds.  It is small and light enough to easily fit in my purse or carry on.  At the price I paid if gets kicked or crunched when shoved under a seat or into a over head compartment, no big deal.I purchased this specifically to travel with and for that purpose it is great.  For a tablet for everyday use I would recommend paying extra for a little better model--but for the price this one works surprisingly well.  One thing I will say in this tablet's favor is that it didn't come with a lot of pre-installed bloatware.  My pricier tablet came loaded with a lot of apps I don't want and won't use.

Reviews.Title: This is a steal and a great Android
Reviews.Author: Bookie "Bookie"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this tablet.I read books and read and send emails. for the price you cannot beat it.And it works great. Easy for a beginner.I went back and bought another for a gift for a friend and they loved it also.

Reviews.Title: better instructions
Reviews.Author: peter greenwood
Reviews.Content: its reasonable,.instructions hard to understand, screen not good when working outside otherwise fairly satisfactory but would not buy again for anyone

Reviews.Title: Screen Very Fragile
Reviews.Author: cm
Reviews.Content: Just be careful and not for kids under 15..wait til they are responsible enough to use this product lol lol

Reviews.Title: Support 3G Dongle?
Reviews.Author: LRBB from CRC
Reviews.Content: I'm very disspointed since it doesn't support #G dongle as described. And the battery life is simple the worst I ever had in and electronic device.

Reviews.Title: Low price negated by having to buy extra stuff to make it work
Reviews.Author: Sylvia Hutson
Reviews.Content: This tablet would not charge with the cord that came with it, so I have had to spend $25 on different charging accessories... It also will not recognize the "Square" card reader, which it the main purpose that I bought the thing for... I spent more money buying an extension for the headphone plug in hopes that it was just the connection with that particular "square", but it did not work... The square works on other android units, but not mine...  It does allow me to use some android apps that I need right now, so that is the only reason I have not returned it...

Reviews.Title: Price/Function, I like it.
Reviews.Author: Gary Gone
Reviews.Content: With the reasonable price,  the Tablet is suitable for travelling...  but battery last only 2 hours...may need to have power-bank on the road.  I like it.

Reviews.Title: Oh my gosh
Reviews.Author: brianna filips
Reviews.Content: well, i bought this for my brother's birthday, which was yesterday. i was waiting to review this item until he had it in his hands. he opened it and saw it needed charged. no big deal. we put it on the charger and it took ALL DAY to charge. not only that,  but he said it was slower than ever. i was hoping i could review high on this but i don't believe the product deserves it.

Reviews.Title: You're throwing your money away.
Reviews.Author: Sarah Bellotti
Reviews.Content: It's really slow to respond and the photo quality is horrible. It's slow, disconnects itself from the internet randomly, and the mini USB port or whatever fell off the motherboard so I can't plug it into my computer anymore. I took it to a computer repair shop and they said to repair it would cost more than the whole thing is worth. I got it a month ago and have only used it a handful of times - sad.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Bonnie Bolen
Reviews.Content: This is a great value. I handed it to our 14 year old granddaughter and she loved it! Thank you

Reviews.Title: Alldaymall Andriod
Reviews.Author: carol nagy
Reviews.Content: Could not get it to charge completely. Directions were useless. They did not tell one how to use it and were vague.

Reviews.Title: NIFTY!
Reviews.Author: Augustine
Reviews.Content: This is a great multi-functional device.  It's compact but definitely gets the job done.  I have no hesitation to recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: very slow and no good conections with wifi
Reviews.Author: KIMBERLY STEELE
Reviews.Content: I was very disappointed with this tablet.  The price was nice but the quality stinks!DONT BUY THIS IT DROPS WIFI OR HAS TROUBLE FINDING IT.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: David Rivera
Reviews.Content: This tablet does everything it's supposed to, and for what it cost, does it very well. The screen does kinda scratch up a bit, but that's only because I don't have a screen protector.

Reviews.Title: the best
Reviews.Author: MAMADOU    SECK
Reviews.Content: this is a really good tablet,the only problem i had was the battery get drain really fast but other that it the best tablet i had

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my son..
Reviews.Author: Brooke
Reviews.Content: The screen is kinda dark...the charger broke the day I got it, thank god I had an extra one. The battery life isnt the best BUT it does its job and its great for my 7yr old.

Reviews.Title: Very decent tablet
Reviews.Author: Jml
Reviews.Content: I was skeptical when I bought my brother this tablet for a graduation present, but I must say he loves it and I'm thinking of buying one myself. This tablet. Is extremely thin and the touch screen works pretty well. As for the speed it does lag and the viewing angels are bad. Over all I say you can't beat it for a budget tablet. One major draw back however is it uses a propriatery charger.

Reviews.Title: Money's worth
Reviews.Author: C. Yamaguchi "pax"
Reviews.Content: product came within a reasonable amount of time, esp for free shipping...works well..no complaints so far, except for short battery life--meter on device does not appear accurate...drainage possibly depends on functions using...unsure how to close apps, so this may be draining battery as does online usage

Reviews.Title: android
Reviews.Author: lisa
Reviews.Content: My tablet is great. It does everything i need it to do. It was a great purchase. Best buy ever.

Reviews.Title: It's okay
Reviews.Author: Gussie
Reviews.Content: This is not a bad item, but you do get what you pay for.  Very light weight.  I ordered 2 and had to immediately send one back because the screen did not work.  Luckily, the customer service was amazing and made the return simple and fast!  The power cord fits into the tablet awkwardly.  It's hard to plug it in and it doesn't go all of the way in...just enough that it connects.  Functions similarly to any other Android tablet.  If you are wanting a tablet that will get a lot of use, I would invest in something a bit more ... but for my mother (who can barely use electronics) it works fine for her to check email and play games.

Reviews.Title: 7 in. tablet
Reviews.Author: Diane L. Fredrick
Reviews.Content: This product is just what I ordered, this is  my first tablet and works just great,still learning all the features

Reviews.Title: Pretty Nice.
Reviews.Author: dushann smith
Reviews.Content: I like this tablet, and it actually seems to be a pretty good item. Its holds a whole lit if applications, games, movies, music and I am able to multitask without any issue. Its easy to use which is even better because I have to do things quickly, like taking notes for class or searching for stuff. What I don't like are the chargers, however. They don't charge properly, but I have other chargers so thats all right. It doesn't have Bluetooth or at least it doesn't properly show the settings. Some words are misspelled while going to the settings menu. Other than that, its a good product. I would recommend it for people who need a tablet, and never had one. Its good to start with. Nice job All Day Mall, and I hope to see you guys come up with better products.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Beverly in Ormond Beach
Reviews.Content: This little tablet is a typical clone, and works great from removal from the box. Its battery is low on duration, so keep the screen brightness down, but it sets up easy, logs onto the local WiFi network quickly and has reasonable processor speed for using the web. The keyboard is almost a necessity with this one if you want to max out its use. It is light weight and the wife loves it.

Reviews.Title: Not that great
Reviews.Author: J. Chun
Reviews.Content: To me I thought the quality of the product was ok.  It didn't seem cheaply made, but I could not controll it.  The date would change back to 2000 everytime I turned it on.  It went where it wanted to, it turned off when it wanted to, the battery seems to run out pretty fast.

Reviews.Title: HOW DO YOU CONTACT ALIDAYMALL ?
Reviews.Author: gaon escude
Reviews.Content: there is no phone number or address to contact this company the manuel of instructions is so small you need a magnifying glass to read it.  could you please send me info on contacting this company. also the keyboard on thecase does not work on this android. would like to know if there is a defect or this is not compatible. why would a company conceal their name and not provide any warranty information or contact no? gescude@yahoo.com

Reviews.Title: Cute tablet
Reviews.Author: David G "Rassy"
Reviews.Content: The tablet works so well except the battery doesn't last very long but I love playing with it and the way it's set us it's so easy to use. It's more stable then an iPad I don't ever feel like its going to brake or need a case. It has a camera in the front which is great especially at the price of this deviceAll in all very good item

Reviews.Title: Amazing for the price! AND includes Jellybean 4.1!!!
Reviews.Author: Morisato
Reviews.Content: Purchased this as a gift! And they love it :) This is a good gift for someone who has never had a tablet before.Pros:  - Includes JELLYBEAN 4.1! Yes. Although this tablet only has 512MB of RAM, it is factory installed with JellyBean 4.1.1 (refer to photos)  - Has a good feel to it, doesn't feel flimsy (I expected to for the price).  - The screen looks good, when directly facing it.Cons:  - Slow loading times, but that's to be expected from a budget tablet.  - On the tablet we received, the AC Adapter sticks out slightly. (This worried me a little, as I'm uncertain whether or not you could get shocked by touching the exposed part that slightly sticks out).I'll update this review if anything happens to the tablet during normal use. Otherwise, GREAT tablet especially for the price!
